reviews.review: I have played cs since 1.5. My favorite fps game of all time!

This is a game that you can have fun alone, or with friends, for hours on end. Yeah sure you run into smurfs and cheaters every other game. or get reported into low trust factor if you make 1 nuts play on a comp, but if you just focus on the fun you could be having rather than rank, you will love this game for hours

My son has unfathomable levels of autism and this is the only game that calms him down. It gives me and my wife some peace and quiet! If it weren't for this game, he'd be saying "um!" non-stop. Thank you, developers, for bringing some peace to my life.
Best game in the world (better than Valorant)
